actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs

official_title: To remove from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System certain properties in South Carolina.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to revise Coastal Barrier Resources System maps relating to the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Unit SC-03 in South Carolina to remove parcels of land at specified addresses on S. Waccamaw Drive and Sailfish Drive in Murrells Inlet, SC 29576, in the property records of Georgetown County, South Carolina.

titles.title: To remove from the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System certain properties in South Carolina.
